short_summary: The Canadian Forces School of Military Engineering (CFSME) requires survey and drafting equipment.
description: The Canadian Forces School of Military Engineering (CFSME) Drafting and Survey Cell (DS Cell), located in Oromocto, NB requires the supply and delivery of survey and drafting equipment as described in the Annex - Statement of requirement.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## W2037-230075 - Drafting and Survey Equipment

### Notice Details
* **Reference Number:** WS3753247925-Doc3755039395
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3753247925
* **Publication Date:** 2022-11-24
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-12-13T14:00:00

### Tender Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply and delivery of survey and drafting equipment to the Canadian Forces School of Military Engineering (CFSME) Drafting and Survey Cell (DS Cell) in Oromocto, New Brunswick.

### Tender Requirements
The Government of Canada requires the following equipment:

* Length and thickness measuring instruments
* Land surveying instruments
* Land surveying services

### Trade Agreement
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)

### Contact Information
To obtain the RFP and any additional documents, please refer to the following contract information:

* Contracting Entity Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact Name: Young, Leesa
* Contact Email: <leesa.young@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
* Official Tender Website: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14729405?extsite=MTQ3Mjk0MDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
